title: Ep. 99 "Ain't No Fun Unless We All Get Some"
description:
This week we're joined by a professional couple with an open marriage. They discuss the highs and lows of their marriage, putting away insecurities, and keeping their lifestyle private from family, friends, and colleagues.


Come hang out with us at the meet & greet Sunday September 9th at Escobar!


Follow Us

contact us cocktales.atl@gmail.com
